required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Real-Life Study With Nivolumab (BMS-936558) in Advanced NSCLC Patients After Prior Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: A National, Prospective, Non-Interventional Study (NIS) of Nivolumab (BMS-936558) In Patients With Locally Advanced Or Metastatic Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) With Squamous and Non-Squamous Histology (Stage IIIB/IV) After Prior Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: This study intends to describe the real-life effectiveness and safety of nivolumab in advanced NSCLC patients in Germany, as well as the patient profile, pattern of use and the quality of life.

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of socio-demographic characteristics in adult patients diagnosed with advanced NSCLC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and for up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of clinical characteristics in adult patients diagnosed with advanced NSCLC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and for up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of treatment patterns in adult patients diagnosed with advanced NSCLC
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and for up to 5 years

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution of Incidence of All Adverse Events (AEs)
Distribution of Severity of All Adverse Events (AEs)
Distribution of Management of All Adverse Events (AEs)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: At baseline and for up to 5 years
At baseline and for up to 5 years

arm_group.arm_group_label: NSCLC patients with squamous tumor histology
NSCLC patients with non-squamous tumor histology

study_pop.textblock: Both cohorts will be recruited in different sites. Office-based as well as outpatient units in clinics.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC, Stage IIIB/Stage IV
2. Decision to initiate a treatment with Nivolumab for the first time already undertaken by physician
3. Males and Females, â‰¥18 years of age
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Current primary diagnosis of a cancer other than advanced NSCLC. Example: A cancer other than NSCLC that requires systemic or other treatment.
2. Pre-treatment with Nivolumab and/or Ipilimumab (pre-treatment with checkpoint-inhibitors other than Nivolumab and Ipilimumab, and Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors(TKIs) is allowed)
3. Current participation in an interventional clinical trial for treatment of NSCLC. (Patients who have completed their participation in an interventional trial or who are not receiving study drug anymore and who are only followed-up for overall survival can be enrolled. For blinded studies, the treatment administered needs to be known)

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information, please email:

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT# and Site #.
